documents.document: @PatsKarvelas Congratulations, Pats! I'm sure your youngest will love it as much as their older sibling. You & Pete are raising them well. 🙂
@timbawden @ChristineMilne Beautiful, though omfg they really know how to bite!! @Tim_Beshara has posted loads of photos of them. ☺
@caseyconway_ Good on you. I'm glad that LGBTI kids, Aboriginal or not, have a good indigenous role model to look up to on this. 😊
